snippet: In its latest foray into new media, the private equity firm Carlyle Group releases a podcast in which William E. Conway Jr., the co-founder and co-chief executive, discusses the investment outlook for the coming year.
abstract: In its latest foray into new media, the private equity firm Carlyle Group releases a podcast in which William E. Conway Jr., the co-founder and co-chief executive, discusses the investment outlook for the coming year.
